argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnval.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | psgnval.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) |
| 3 |  | psgnval.n | |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } = { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5, 3 | #P_psgnfn | |- N Fn { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 7 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( N Fn { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } -> dom N = { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom N = { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) = ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 1, 4, 9 | #P_symggen | |- ( D e. V -> ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) ` T ) = { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_symggrp | |- ( D e. V -> G e. Grp ) |
| 12 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. V -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 14 | 2, 1, 4 | #P_symgtrf | |- T C_ ( Base ` G ) |
| 15 | 4, 9 | #P_gsumwspan | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) ` T ) = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_sylancl | |- ( D e. V -> ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) ` T ) = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 16 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( D e. V -> { p e. ( Base ` G ) | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 17 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( D e. V -> dom N = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( D e. V -> ( P e. dom N <-> P e. ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) = ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( G gsum w ) e. _V |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_elrnmpti | |- ( P e. ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) <-> E. w e. Word T P = ( G gsum w ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 22 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( D e. V -> ( P e. dom N <-> E. w e. Word T P = ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
